subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The former Olympic champion Justin Gatlin won a 100-meter race in 10.24 seconds Tuesday in Rakvere, Estonia, in his first competition after a four-year doping ban.
snippet: The former Olympic champion Justin Gatlin won a 100-meter race in 10.24 seconds Tuesday in Rakvere, Estonia, in his first competition after a four-year doping ban.
